burlap.shell.visual

Class TextAreaStreams

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.shell.visual.TextAreaStreams

  • public class TextAreaStreams
extends java.lang.Object
    Object that provides an InputStream and OutputStream that affect the content of a JTextArea. Specifically, this code is used to instantiate a GUI for the EnvironmentShell used by a VisualExplorer.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan.
